scripts.prebuild: node -e "console.log('Verificando templates...'); const fs=require('fs'); ['index.html','servicos.html','sobre.html','contato.html','blog.html','artigo.html'].forEach(f => { if(!fs.existsSync('./templates/'+f)) console.error('FALTA: templates/'+f); else console.log('OK: templates/'+f); })"
scripts.postbuild: node -e "console.log('Verificando build...'); const fs=require('fs'); ['dist/index.html','dist/pt/index.html','dist/en/index.html','dist/es/index.html'].forEach(f => { if(!fs.existsSync(f)) console.error('FALTA: '+f); else console.log('OK: '+f); })"
